Sites

Martin Fowler’s website is a treasure trove of architectural goodness.

Uncle Bob Martin has a series of videos at Clean Coders. They are all worth watching.

Live In Greatness is a well-designed site that does a great job laying out The Core Protocols. We find the Ask for Help protocol to be very useful.

Refactoring is another well-designed site. This one has a catalog of bad “code smells” as well as good refactoring methods to address the “smells”.
